name: Pick a Color: Fast Tapping Extravaganza
name_original: Pick a Color: Fast Tapping Extravaganza
description:
Tap the color that the middle word says
But be careful! sometimes the color of the word IS NOT the color you should click.

Pick normal or fast mode, and see if you can get a high score.

*Share to social Media
*Fast/slow mode
*See how you rank on the Leaderboards.
